comments.en:
Only available in Japan.

7-ink (CcMmYyK) high-end photo printer with 1.8 pl minimum drop size, 360 black nozzles, 180 nozzles per color, high-speed 4-ink 360-dpi mode. Maximum paper size is A4/Letter/Legal.

Preliminary support in Gimp-Print 4.3.12 and newer. Still completely untuned, so do not expect high color quality.

Consumables/Refills: 7 separate ink tanks: Cyan, light cyan, magenta, light magenta, yellow, dark yellow, black
